title: Rename companion experience from YouTubeMe.co to YouTubeMe.xyz across the UI

requirements.text: Update all companion-experience labels, user-facing copy, and external links in the frontend from “YouTubeMe.co” to “YouTubeMe.xyz”, including the Discover page card, the “What’s New” bullet, the footer CTA label, and the YouTubeMe informational page content.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Discover page, the companion card title and button text say “YouTubeMe.xyz” (not “YouTubeMe.co”).
On the Discover page, the companion card opens https://YouTubeMe.xyz (not https://YouTubeMe.co).
In the Discover page “What’s New” list, any mention of “YouTubeMe.co” is replaced with “YouTubeMe.xyz”.
In the footer, the optional CTA button label reads “YouTubeMe.xyz”.
On the YouTubeMe informational page, the heading and all body copy refer to “YouTubeMe.xyz” and the external link points to https://YouTubeMe.xyz.
No remaining user-visible text in the frontend references “YouTubeMe.co”.

constraints: Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not implement domain/DNS changes, redirects, hosting, or deployment for YouTubeMe.xyz.
Do not add new backend APIs or modify backend state/schema for this rename.
Do not change MeTube/metube.xyz branding beyond updating the companion-domain references.
